answers.answer: Thyroid disorders can have a significant effect on blood glucose levels and, left untreated, can affect diabetes control. Will it get better...? Best discuss this with your doctor since he/she has access to your medical records/history.
Thank you for the feed back

question: I am new to this so not sure if i am posting to the right place or anything.. lol Can a person become diabetic if their thyroid is underactive? will it get better once the thyroid is back active?
title: Curiosity
